title: Todo Mark Complete
description: Master toggling todo completion status, visual feedback, and state synchronization with storage
learningOutcomes: Toggle completion status of individual todos
Manage visual feedback for completed vs pending states
Update todos immutably while preserving other properties

functions.name: markTodoComplete
functions.description: Mark a specific todo as complete by ID

functions.name: toggleTodoStatus
functions.description: Toggle completion status (complete → pending or pending → complete)

functions.name: uncompleteTodo
functions.description: Mark a completed todo back as pending

functions.name: getCompletedTodos
functions.description: Get array of all completed todos

functions.name: getPendingTodos
functions.description: Get array of all pending (not completed) todos

functions.name: renderCompletedState
functions.description: Render a todo with visual feedback based on completion status

functions.name: updateCompletionInStorage
functions.description: Save updated completion status to localStorage

functions.name: filterByCompletion
functions.description: Filter todos by completion status or criteria

functions.name: countCompleted
functions.description: Get count of completed todos and total todos
